html:
Attribute / Property proper binding

//Bad
<img src=”{{imagePath}}”>

//Bad
<img [src]=imagePath>

// Good
<img [src]=”imagePath” [disabled]=””>

Line Optimization

// Bad

    If (this.value == 1) {  
       this.dosomething()
} else {
          	   this.doDiffThing()
       }

// Good
If (this.value == 1) this.dosomething()

meta.title: Good And Bad Coding
meta.subtitle: Guide for good and bad coding
